availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harrison R. Littell (Christian County, Kentucky, attorney and judge)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Kentucky native. Married to Bettie Wallace Littell in Christian County, Kentucky, on October 12, 1869. Attorney in Christian County in 1863. Presiding judge of Christian County Court in Christian County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Christian County, KY, July 1863, p. 29.
